General.Name: Beken Corp
General.Description: Beken Corporation engages in the manufacture and sale of wireless communication products in China and internationally. The company offers wireless data transmission products, including Wi-Fi and bluetooth data transmission, proprietary wireless data, and national standard electronic toll collection; wireless audio products comprising Wi-Fi audio and video, bluetooth audio, walkie-talkie, digital microphone, and broadcast/FM; and wireless video and satellite navigation products. It serves the Internet of Things, Internet of Vehicles, smart speakers, smart storytellers, Bluetooth speakers and earphones, wireless keyboards and mouse, drones, digital microphones, and walkie-talkie applications. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
